resources.string: Please Enter Your New Lock Combination

string-array.name: intro_descriptions
string-array.item: Secure your smartphone with realistic door lock theme. Just click on Enable Lock button set secret password, you can also enable sound effects on unlock.
Select your secret password and Click OK button to lock screen with door lock screen.
Choose latest theme of Awesome door locks, So that screen locks with your selected theme

resources.string: You already have setup the System Screen Lock that can\'t be disabled. You will need to unlock the phone twice if you setup Awesome Door Lock Screen.
Great! One more step disable your system lock
So you don\'t need to unlock your phone twice. It\'s safe and easy
Share this incredible app with your friends and family. Enjoy phone security with a new fancy look
